snippet: There was a recent perception that the United States had pulled even, if not ahead, in soccer. Coming off its Olympic gold and recent wins in the rivalry, Mexico has changed that.
abstract: United States national soccer team is preparing to face Mexico, which is fresh of its gold medal performance at the London Games; the Americans have been playing Mexico since 1934, but have yet to win a game on Mexican soil.
lead_paragraph: There was a recent perception that the United States had pulled even, if not ahead, in soccer. Coming off its Olympic gold and recent wins in the rivalry, Mexico has changed that.

headline.seo: Mexico Rebuilds Its Old Soccer Edge on U.S.
headline.main: In Mexico-U.S. Rivalry, the Edge Heads South
headline.print_headline: In Mexico-U.S. Rivalry, the Edge Heads South
